result.title: Codeforces Simulator
result.content:
Hi all.

I want to introduce you a small game I made about codeforces.

It is web game. Here is the link: https://craus.github.io/codeforces-simulator/

Also created a "More games" section there, if you would be interested in my other games. I love making them. One was released on Steam yesterday. You can —Åheck it out as well.
